room_title: Escape room "The Lost Temple" by Escape Quest in Washington, D.C.
review: Enjoyed the unending puzzles with a group of geniuses! We had an outstanding adventure, loads of laughs, and heaps of mental exercise in "The Lost Temple". It was amazing to enjoy this extensive interactive entertainment!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Temple" by Escape Quest in Washington, D.C.
review: My friends and I had a blast as we tried to escape from The Temple of Doom. We escaped just in time (00:06). We are looking forward to doing it again and this time with less clues.

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Temple" by Escape Quest in Washington, D.C.
review: Booked and changed the reservation for 8 people a couple times and the staff were just wonderful! We did The Lost Temple room. It was fun and interesting! I had a good experience! We finished the room with just 10 mins to spare. I would definitely come back to play The Black Widow!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Temple" by Escape Quest in Washington, D.C.
review: I went for my birthday with a few other friends for my first escape room - The Lost Temple. We had a lot of fun, it was the perfect level of challenging and we made it with a few minutes to spare. I'm sure I'll be back to do other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Temple" by Escape Quest in Washington, D.C.
review: My 14-year-old son and I went today and teamed up 4 others we'd never met but had a blast figuring out the clues for each challenge in The Lost Temple. What a fun experience! Can't wait to go back and try another room.
